item.title: Development Setup with Ubuntu on ThinkPad T480
item.description: After using Arch Linux for about 4 years, and various Linux distros like Mint and Debian before that, I have finally decided to settle with Ubuntu. I have been using Ubuntu for about 6 months now and it’s a great distro for Computer Engineering. Is it the best distro for development? I am not saying it’s perfect, it’s slow at times(especially snap apps), and it’s hard to back up and restore.
